        Returns:
        Detailed folder's information
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • createFolder

        public YfyFolder createFolder(String name,
                     long parentId)
                       throws YfyException
        Create a new empty folder inside the specified parent folder in the personal space
        Parameters:
        name - New folder name
        parentId - New folder's parent id in fangcloud
        Returns:
        Detailed new folder's information
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • createFolder

        public YfyFolder createFolder(String name,
                     long parentId,
                     Long departmentId)
                       throws YfyException
        Create a new empty folder inside the specified parent folder in the department space
        Parameters:
        name - New folder name
        parentId - New folder's parent id in fangcloud
        departmentId - New folder's department id in fangcloud(only effect when parent id is 0)
        Returns:
        Detailed new folder's information
        Throws:
        YfyException

        public SuccessResult deleteFolder(long folderId)
                           throws YfyException
        Delete a folder to trash
        Parameters:
        folderId - Folder id in fangcloud
        Returns:
        An object only has one attribute named success
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • deleteFolderFromTrash

        public SuccessResult deleteFolderFromTrash(long folderId)
                                    throws YfyException
        Permanently delete a specific folder that is in the trash. The folder will no longer exist in fangcloud. This action cannot be undone.
        Parameters:
        folderId - Folder id in fangcloud
        Returns:
        An object only has one attribute named success
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • restoreFolderFromTrash

        public SuccessResult restoreFolderFromTrash(long folderId)
                                     throws YfyException
        Restore a specific folder that have been moved to the trash. Default behavior is to restore the folder to the parent folder it was in before it was moved to the trash
        Parameters:
        folderId - Folder id in fangcloud
        Returns:
        An object only has one attribute named success
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • moveFolder

        public SuccessResult moveFolder(long folderId,
                       long targetFolderId)
                         throws YfyException
        Move a folder to another folder
        Parameters:
        folderId - Folder id in fangcloud
        targetFolderId - Folder id of the destination folder in fangcloud
        Returns:
        An object only has one attribute named success
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • getChildren

        public GetChildrenResult getChildren(long folderId,
                            int pageId,
                            int pageCapacity,
                            ItemTypeEnum itemType)
                              throws YfyException
        Retrieve the files and/or folders contained within this folder without any other info about the folder. The requests need paging param assigned by developer.
        Parameters:
        folderId - Folder id in fangcloud
        pageId - Page id begin with 0
        pageCapacity - Files and/or folders' list size once return
        itemType - Type of item. see ItemTypeEnum
        Returns:
        Object contains two lists named "folders" and "files", and other page information
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • getPersonalItems

        public GetChildrenResult getPersonalItems(int pageId,
                                 int pageCapacity,
                                 ItemTypeEnum itemType)
                                   throws YfyException
        Retrieve the files and/or folders contained in personal space. The requests need paging param assigned by developer.
        Parameters:
        pageId - Page id begin with 0
        pageCapacity - Files and/or folders' list size once return
        itemType - Type of item. see ItemTypeEnum
        Returns:
        Object contains two lists named "folders" and "files", and other page information
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • getDepartmentFolders

        public GetChildrenResult getDepartmentFolders(long departmentId,
                                     int pageId,
                                     int pageCapacity,
                                     ItemTypeEnum itemType)
                                       throws YfyException
        Retrieve the files and/or folders contained in department space. The requests need paging param assigned by developer.
        Parameters:
        departmentId - department id in Fangcloud
        pageId - Page id begin with 0
        pageCapacity - Files and/or folders' list size once return
        itemType - Type of item. see ItemTypeEnum
        Returns:
        Object contains two lists named "folders" and "files", and other page information
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • getCollabFolders

        public GetCollabFoldersResult getCollabFolders(int pageId,
                                      int pageCapacity)
                                        throws YfyException
        Retrieve the folders that have collaboration with you. The requests need paging param assigned by developer.
        Parameters:
        pageId - Page id begin with 0
        pageCapacity - Files and/or folders' list size once return
        Returns:
        Object contains a list named "folders", and other page information
        Throws:
        YfyException
